results.title: A resolution designating February 28, 2017, as "Rare Disease Day".
results.short_title: A resolution designating February 28, 2017, as "Rare Disease Day".
results.latest_major_action: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1505-1506)
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates February 28, 2017, as Rare Disease Day. Expresses support for a national and global commitment to developing new treatments, diagnostics, and cures for rare diseases and disorders.
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Designates February 28, 2017, as Rare Disease Day. Expresses support for a national and global commitment to developing new treatments, diagnostics, and cures for rare diseases and disorders.

actions.description: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S1505-1506)
